channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Suspect in Charlie Kirk killing became more political, opposed activist’s views, authorities say
item.description: A 22-year-old Utah man who was booked on murder charges in the assassination of Charlie Kirk held deep disdain for the conservative activist’s provocative viewpoints and indicated to a family member that he was responsible for the shooting.

item.title: Man arrested in Charlie Kirk’s killing had no known criminal history, had become ‘more political’
Choose your America: In the aftermath of the Kirk slaying, a snapshot of a fractured nation
